name: forge-tree
description: A powerful tool to scaffold project structures from ASCII tree diagrams. Supports smart detection of project types, custom templates, and extensive configuration options.
author: Clement Abel

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && node -e "require('fs').chmodSync('dist/index.js',0o755)" && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const templatesDir=path.join('src','templates');const distTemplatesDir=path.join('dist','templates');fs.mkdirSync(distTemplatesDir,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(templatesDir).forEach(f=>fs.copyFileSync(path.join(templatesDir,f),path.join(distTemplatesDir,f)));"
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.ci:verify: npm run ci:lint && npm run ci:test && npm run ci:build
scripts.local: npm ci && npm run build && npm link && forge-tree --help
